definitions.explanation: a person in the context of business processes (IS A person[means->businessProcess])
a contact or organization that acts as a party in a business process (IS A oneOf[contact, organization])
a type indicator for kinds of parties
indicates a individual party
indicates a organizational party
The identifying name for a contact or organization that acts as a party in a business process
The identifying name for a contact or organization that acts as a party in a business process
an individual acting as a point of contact (IS A commerce.contact)
a type indicator for the type or primacy of a contact. IS A (kindOf[of->contact])
means a contact kind which indicates the primary or main contact. IS A (contactKind[means->primary])
a product, part, component, material that is purchased, sold, transported, consumed.
a type indicator for fundamental kinds of an item such as raw material, finished goods, component part. IS A (kindOf[of->item])
means the specific itemKind indicating raw materials. IS A (itemKind[means->rawMaterial])
means the specific itemKind indicating a component or intermediate step. IS A (itemKind[means->component])
means the specific itemKind indicating finished products. IS A (itemKind[means->finishedProduct])
a subscription, unit of work or other value added service that is offered, sold, used
an item and/or service (IS A oneOf[item, service])
a summary document, often with associated details, that represents a transaction, request, process
a type indicator for kinds of orders. like sales, purchase, shipping. IS A (kindOf[of->order])
detail lines that represent the parts of a complete order, transaction, process
a type indicator for kinds of detail lines. like salesOrder, purchaseOrder. IS A (kindOf[of->detailLine])
a party in the role of customer who purchase or uses products
a party in the role of customer who purchase or uses products
a party in the role of supplier who manufactures or sells products
a building or structure with a known location such as factory, warehouse, office
a name for a facility (IS A name[has->kind[means->facility])
a type indicator for kinds of facilities. like factory, plant, warehouse. IS A (kindOf[of->facility])
items on hand
explanation of component parts
monetary value spent to acquire
monetary value charged to provide
an event with which a specific price is associated
a type indicator for kinds of a price associations: shipDates, orderDates, etc.
an interaction involving a product, service, material
a type indicator for kinds of item interactions. like sales, purchase, shipping. IS A (kindOf[of->itemInteraction])
sales of items

purchase of items

fulfillment of items

the difficult to name property of a shipment that explains when a partial shipment is allowed or happening versus a total shipment
a type indicator for options of shipmentIntegrity. partial or total
indicates a partial shipment is requested, allowed or happening
indicates a complete or total shipment is requested, allowed or happening
